title: PROJECT: FICTION - Winners! [fan fic contest results]
body:
http://i.imgur.com/17fdpYO.jpg

#Congratulations to our three* winners: NegaDKR, Aguamagician, and Eevlynn!

The results are in, and I have finished giving my feedback on the [PROJECT: FICTION fan-fiction competition](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/aOV8UEy9-fan-fic-micro-competition-project-fiction?show=nested)!  Our mission to the PROJECT universe resulted in a _wealth_ of harrowing mission reports, traumatic audio-log transcripts, and tear-jerking memory readouts.  For those interested in some cold, hard, uncaring, statistics, you all created:

* 77 entries, (within the time limit)
* 37 mentions of Leona, 
* 30 of Zed, 
* 25 of Master Yi, 
* 23 of Lucian, 
* 21 mentions of Fiora, and 
* 16 of Yasuo.

(Thanks to CaptainMårvelous for running the numbers for me while I was judging.  I would have used champ icons to make this prettier, but this post is looooong already.)

Incredible work by everyone who entered - you all made judging a wonderfully difficult task :D  It was a joy to read these all.  The winners should be getting a little something through their client by midday today (PST).  Speaking of the winners, jack in, zone out, and enjoy these stories from the PROJECT universe:
________________________________________________________________
##Player's Choice Winner (16 votes\*\*): NegaDKR (NA)
 **Date: Classified**
 **PROJECT: Zed**
 **Status: Unstable**
 
 Specimen has been growing increasingly hostile ever since VR training session with **PROJECT: Shen**.  Specimen said to have stared upon its fellow **PROJECT** for several minutes, ignoring all commands before eventually entering combat mode and attacking **PROJECT: Shen**. Both specimens were put into controlled stasis before severe damage could be made onto either **PROJECT**. 
 
 **PROJECT: Zed** has been subjected with higher levels of **SERUM** dosage since then, but each increased injection has been met with more and more hostility. If specimen continues resisting **SERUM** effects and growing unruliness, forced shut down may be only option.
 
 Log: End
 
 **Date: Classified** 
 **PROJECT: Zed**
 **Status: Missing**
 
 Specimen has broken out of containing unit and all connection towards it have been lost. All attempts of search and recapture have been met with negative results, other **PROJECT** units are being sealed and monitored until further notice.
 
 Lead Researcher Stanwick Piddly has issued a forced shut down upon **PROJECT: Zed** when found. Specimen will be scrapped and parts used for future **PROJECT** units.
 
 Log: End
 
  ~~Date: Classified~~
 ~~PROJECT: Zed~~
 ~~Status: HOSTILE!~~
 
~~SPECIMEN HAS ATTACKED LABORATORY AND IS KILLING RESEARCHERS LEFT AND RIGHT SOMEONE HEL-~~

**Log: End**

([Original post link here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/aOV8UEy9-fan-fic-micro-competition-project-fiction?comment=0007 ))
________________________________________________________________

##Judges-Choice Winner: Aguamagician (NA)

**Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead  Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is dead Zed is
 **
 
 _Download of program_ **PROJECT: ZED personality overlay** _interrupted due to unexpected power loss._
 
 _Continuing with wireless data transfer..._
 
 _Incoming transmission: Video Feed Corrupted. Audio Feed Enabled._
 
 “I'm not sure if you can hear me. I don't have a lot of time and I have no idea if there is enough left inside of you to understand me. I caused a power-loss in the grid so I could ride in the wireless backup. Teemo got me good Intel. Unfortunately that means I owe the psycho a favor.  This message should be sneaking in a file that should help you get loose from their control.
 
 _(Static)
 _
 
 I know I haven't been able to help you in the past, but I can't sit idle as you suffer from your guilt. Nobody could have seen them coming until it was too late; but **PROJECT: OVERDIVE** is all lies! They're...
 
 _(Static)
 _
 
 I don't think this safe-house is secure anymore after a stunt like this. My ward drones are picking up movement not far from here.
 
 _(Static followed by sounds of gunfire and explosions)_
  
 I am running out of time! I don't know if you will or even can open the file, but know this..._sigh_... I don't blame you for what happened to Akali or to Zed. No matter what, we are still the Kinkou, Shen. 
 
 Never forget that; cause at least I won't.”
 
 _Transmission Terminated.
 _
 
 _Data Transfer:_ **COMPLETE**
 _Operating Systems:_ **PROJECT: ZED personality overlay** _98% Completed_
 _Weapon Systems:_ **Online**
 _Motor Systems: _ **Online**
 _Integrated Software:_ **Online**
 _Tracking System:_ **Offline**
 _Control Systems:_ **Offline**
 _Memory Data:_ **Corrupted**
 _Mission Data:_ **Corrupted**
 _Identifying issue
 ..........................
 ..........................
 …......................_**Done!**
 _Additional MIssion File Found:_ **Eye_Of_Twilight.exe**
 _Execute Mission file?_ **Yes No**

([Original post link here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/aOV8UEy9-fan-fic-micro-competition-project-fiction?comment=0024 ))
______________________________________

##Judges-Choice Winner: Eevlynn (NA)

 _Posted by  **[ScornOfTheMoon ](http://cdn5.coloringcrew.com/coloring-book/painted/201101/dfcc6a7fe36298b06450df8b620ae16c.png)** on **September 8, 2015** at **5:20 PM**_ || **1** Person likes this post.

> Just got back from talking with the police and if that wasn't the most frustrating thing anyone in the history of ever has had to deal with, I don't know what is!
>
> Followed their instructions to the letter; left the hospital as soon as they let me, hobbled my way over to the police station, and did my best to explain to them the situation but in the end, all I got were a couple of mean looks from the officers (one of them even laughing in my face!) and the boot from the station before I was done.
>
> I know what I saw, and no amount of shoddy (and not to mention RUDE) police-work is going to change that. They're trying to pass it off as a simple terrorist attack - hah! How would you explain the sheer amount of destruction to that street after the explosions? No technology that I know of could cause that kind of damage. Plus, how does any of that police report explain how I was the ONLY survivor this mess who _also _miraculously managed to get away with only a broken leg? (Oh wait, I "lied about being there" as far as they're concerned. Silly me.)
>
> And the biggest mysteries of them all are the ones that I didn't even get to report thanks to the _wonderful _police force: Who, and **what**, was she and why did she save **me **(well, most of me, anyway - hah!) of all people...?
> 
> All I wanted were some donuts from Pantheon's Bakery...instead, I got a bunch of pain and now I donut (hah!) see any other option than to take the detective work into my own hands and find out just what exactly is going on here.
>
> **She **might be a good place to start.
>
> Broken leg or not, I'm going to find you, whoever you are. See you soon (I hope) !! {{summoner:6}} 

 **Seems like no one has joined the conversation yet, be the first to comment below!**

> **Leave a comment...**
> ________
> _Logged in as [**TheRadiantDawn**](http://www.sac.edu/StudentServices/VRC/Documents/sun-clip-art-jixpRkdiE.png)_

([Original post link here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/aOV8UEy9-fan-fic-micro-competition-project-fiction?show=nested&comment=000c ))
____________

There were far too many brilliant stories to list them all here, but the authors that made it particularly difficult to choose include: **Helmight, Toa Innodence, Lightdragoon88, Jharr, A Superb Villian, Small Critter**, and many many more.  It's people like yourself that make these competitions a _delight_ to read :D

Thank you ALL so much :D

###### \* Yep, I said there'd be two winners but I kept editing this post over and over again, trying to decide between Aguamagician and Eevlynn, and life is too short for decisions _so_ difficult.
###### \*\* Curious about the voting?  I checked with the guys who work behind the scenes on the boards to find out the actual up and down vote totals, and NegaDKR had the most up votes with 16.  I dislike the boards system for measuring popularity (as mentioned in one of the comments here) so I had to do the best with what I had.  Downvotes are mean, anyway.

replies.body: Congratulations to NegaDKR, Aguamagician, and Eevlynn! You guys really hit it out of the park with your stories. And a big thanks to Bio for putting this on - 'twas fun indeed to see all of the entries :P

Oh my god! thank you so much! 

Thanks to all the readers and to all the great writers that participated in helping to write in the this really great setting.

\\dance

Congratulations to the winners and honorable mentions! It was a great event, were there about 77 entries? That is a big number that shows people had a lot of fun! Hope to see more events of this type in the future.

Thank you !!

I loved being a part in this contest and had a ton of fun with it - any opportunity to make a bunch of lame puns is a great time. 8)

> [{quoted}](name=Eevlynn,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=yablnc6I,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-18T21:14:26.029+0000)
>
> Thank you !!
> 
> I loved being a part in this contest and had a ton of fun with it - any opportunity to make a bunch of lame puns is a great time. 8)

Lame puns are the best puns.
Thank you for all the support! I hope everyone else had as much fun as I did writing their story.
Luminescence, would it be at all possible to be notified if and when the next writing event transpires?

> [{quoted}](name=Dragonzzilla,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=yablnc6I,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-09-19T04:44:02.962+0000)
>
> Luminescence, would it be at all possible to be notified if and when the next writing event transpires?

That's **BIO**luminescence to you, Sunshine.  I didn't go to bio-school for four years just to have punks like you... wait.  What am I saying.

Anyway.  I was talking to one of the peeps who work on the Boards side of things today, and they said that if I wanted to run another fan-fic competition in the future, I should reach out to them to get help letting more people know about it in time to enter.  I said I'd also need help with the judging too, as it could turn into more than just little old me could handle.  Not sure what form that'd take.
Yes, more visibility would be great (although it'd only make the judging part more difficult I imagine) but I definitely would not want to miss out on any future events like this.
Awesome of you to read all of the stories, Bio. How long do you think it took you?

> [{quoted}](name=AsphodelNext,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=yablnc6I,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-09-19T00:55:47.479+0000)
>
> Awesome of you to read all of the stories, Bio. How long do you think it took you?

The reading didn't take too long - they're only 500 words after all.  Reading _and then giving the feedback_ probably took me about 5 or 6 days of all my spare time, including a lazy Sunday :)
Nice jobs guys! As always was a blast!
I think is Kennen speaking in #2
That is what I was going for. I kinda imagined that Kennen would be awesome as a hacker who uses his electro-affinity to travel the net.

> [{quoted}](name=Aguamagician,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=yablnc6I,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-18T23:03:29.887+0000)
>
> That is what I was going for. I kinda imagined that Kennen would be awesome as a hacker who uses his electro-affinity to travel the net.

Gah fucked up my grammar there when editing... lol

But yeah, that does make sense. Good idea, and gratz on the win! :D

Edit:
Also, I like how you added the ward thing and Teemo. Made it feel really like the game. And the fact Teemo is a scout is really funny :3 I liked yours the best for that <3

Got an honorable mention this time. Better than during the Bligewater event. 

I'll consume all this, I will adapt, and I will come out on top next time.


.......or not. Who knows. :P

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=yablnc6I,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-18T17:55:56.248+0000)
> I'll consume all this, I will adapt, and I will come out on top next time.

The desire for improvement is an endless hunger.

{{champion:121}}
Congratulations to the winners!  Your stories were great!
Congratulations! This was a fun contest both to write for and to read all the excellent submissions.
Gratz to the winners. Also, it was no problem helping you out Bio. Thanks again for doing this. ♥
Thank you Bio =] This was fun
I wish I knew about this contest I would have participated
Oh my god Rito, why wasnt this posted in-game? I cant enter if i dont know it exist.

Guess next time if I wanna win, I'll have to step up my game and write about Zed. 

Or puns.
why is my story not there? i worked all day on it :/
thank god, now the project stuff can stop spamming the red tracker.
